name: forex_pairs_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Fetches a list of available forex pairs from the Twelve Data API, with optional filters for base currency, symbol, response format, and quote currency.

currency_base.description: Filter the results by base currency. Defaults to 'EUR'.

symbol.description: Filter the results by symbol. Optional.

format.description: The format of the response. Can be 'json' or 'csv'. Defaults to 'json'.

currency_quote.description: Filter the results by quote currency. Optional.
